How much should you be paying your domestic worker?

Are you paying your domestic worker a living wage? Here is a useful calculator to make sure.

Guys, seriously, this is not the place to be frugal about your budget.

Also, remember that you have responsibilities to your employees that go beyond just paying them. There’s a helpful document on the Department of Labour’s website that will tell you more about the relevant laws and guidelines that you need to know about.
